channel.title: Premiturepk team needed
channel.description:
[size=12pt] PremiturePk 317[/size] progress Features: Balanced fun pking with a mix of old items and customs. Zamorakian whip - drains prayer from the enemy Hestia's Symbol - Sometimes heal you a little in combat (with gfx) Abbysal wrath ring - gives the abbysal whip a chance of hitting more dmg (adds a gfx to those attacks) kratos sword - special attack that ignores armor Combat following and weapon switching works properly. Working hybriding. Working barrow sets Working throwing knives and 2 working custom cbows arrows, bolts and knives drops to ground after fired. very good player vs npc All bonuses both att and def works like they should against npcs. So dhide is actualy good against maging npcs. npcs use block emotes Good economy. Alching npc drops will even be good. Billon tokens incase someone gets that much money no dupes alot of quests (all work)gs special emotes anchor emotes defender emotes vengeance emotes barrelchest emotes greater demon emotes ( not fucking up lesser demons) GWD bosses and minions emotes All skills work Skilling is based around Shilo slayer master, woodcustting, cooking , mining, fishing, farming We need Server Coders/Client Coders/Web Editors/Forum Admins...Coders will get admin depending on what they can do. Application

item.title: Premiturepk team needed
item.dc:creator: @RunePlanet RunePlanet
item.description:
@RunePlanet wrote:

                                                     [size=12pt] PremiturePk 317[/size]
                                                                    progress

Features:
Balanced fun pking with a mix of old items and customs.
Zamorakian whip - drains prayer from the enemy
Hestia’s Symbol - Sometimes heal you a little in combat (with gfx)
Abbysal wrath ring - gives the abbysal whip a chance of hitting more dmg (adds a gfx to those attacks)
kratos sword - special attack that ignores armor
Combat following and weapon switching works properly. Working hybriding.
Working barrow sets
Working throwing knives and 2 working custom cbows
arrows, bolts and knives drops to ground after fired.
very good player vs npc
All bonuses both att and def works like they should against npcs. So dhide is actualy good against maging npcs.
npcs use block emotes
Good economy. Alching npc drops will even be good.
Billon tokens incase someone gets that much money
no dupes
alot of quests (all work)gs special emotes
anchor emotes
defender emotes
vengeance emotes
barrelchest emotes
greater demon emotes ( not fucking up lesser demons)
GWD bosses and minions emotes
All skills work
Skilling is based around Shilo
slayer master, woodcustting, cooking , mining, fishing, farming

We need Server Coders/Client Coders/Web Editors/Forum Admins…Coders will get admin depending on what they can do.
